Development proposals for new employment space must ensure that it does not have a negative impact on the amenity of neighbouring residential dwellings or the operations of neighbouring businesses. 6. Planning conditions may be used to secure Classes E(g)(i), E(g) (ii), and/or E(g)(iii) within designated employment locations or on sites where other Class E uses would not be appropriate. 7. Development proposals for new employment space must demonstrate that: a.
